text: The Oi Kwan Hotel or Aiqun Hotel () is a hotel in Art Deco style in Guangzhou, China. At 64 meters tall with 15 floors, it surpassed the neighboring Nanfang Building to become the tallest building in the city from upon its completion in 1937 to 1967. ==See also== * List of tallest buildings in Guangzhou ==References== Category:Skyscrapers in Guangzhou Category:Hotels in Guangzhou Category:Skyscraper hotels in Guangzhou Category:Hotels established in 1937 Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1937
title: Oi Kwan Hotel
